item.title: Exploits for unpatched Parallels Desktop flaw give root on Macs
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Two different exploits for an unpatched Parallels Desktop privilege elevation vulnerability have been publicly disclosed, allowing users to gain root access on impacted Mac devices. [...]

item.title: Google Cloud introduces quantum-safe digital signatures in KMS
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Google Cloud has introduced quantum-safe digital signatures to its Cloud Key Management Service (Cloud KMS), making them available in preview. [...]

item.title: Beware: PayPal "New Address" feature abused to send phishing emails
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: An ongoing PayPal email scam exploits the platform's address settings to send fake purchase notifications, tricking users into granting remote access to scammers [...]

item.title: Fake CS2 tournament streams used to steal crypto, Steam accounts
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Threat actors are exploiting major Counter-Strike 2 (CS2) competitions, like IEM Katowice 2025 and PGL Cluj-Napoca 2025, to defraud gamers and steal their Steam accounts and cryptocurrency. [...]

item.title: Google Chrome disables uBlock Origin for some in Manifest v3 rollout
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: Google continues its rollout of gradually disabling uBlock Origin and other Manifest V2-based extensions in the Chrome web browser as part of its efforts to push users to Manifest V3-based extensions. [...]

item.title: SpyLend Android malware downloaded 100,000 times from Google Play
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: An Android malware app called SpyLend has been downloaded over 100,000 times from Google Play, where it masqueraded as a financial tool but became a predatory loan app for those in India. [...]

item.title: Hacker steals record $1.46 billion from Bybit ETH cold wallet
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Bybit revealed today that an unknown attacker stole over $1.46 billion worth of cryptocurrency from one of its ETH cold wallets. [...]

item.title: CISA flags Craft CMS code injection flaw as exploited in attacks
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The U.S. Cybersecurity & Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) warns that a Craft CMS remote code execution flaw is being exploited in attacks. [...]

item.title: Apple pulls iCloud end-to-end encryption feature in the UK
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Apple will no longer offer iCloud end-to-end encryption in the United Kingdom after the government requested a backdoor to access Apple customers' encrypted cloud data. [...]

item.title: Apiiro unveils free scanner to detect malicious code merges
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Security researchers at Apiiro have released two free, open-source tools designed to detect and block malicious code before they are added to software projectsÂ to curb supply chain attacks. [...]

item.title: Black Basta ransomware gang's internal chat logs leak online
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: An unknown leaker has released what they claim to be an archive of internal Matrix chat logs belonging to the Black Basta ransomware operation. [...]
